detail_desc: Short top in crinkled jersey with a smocked bodice and square neckline with a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication around the shoulders and hems.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details and a padded shaft with a faux fur trim. Adjustable elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in one side and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles.
Leather loafers with pointed toes and a tab across the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Sleeveless maxi dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck front and back, a bead-embroidered seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined..
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with welt pockets and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Two pairs decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter from approx. 1.5 cm to 3 cm.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Slightly wider-fitting jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Dropped shoulders with raw-edge seams, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Slightly shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Microfibre dress with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and bum. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Sandals with a braided section at the front and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with an adjustable waist with a hook and loop tab at the sides, press-studs and a zip fly. Diagonal pockets, closed seams at critical points, knee patches, reinforced hems and snow flaps with reinforced elastic at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a sparkly stone appliqué on the front.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, decorative chest pocket and press-studs at the crotch.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pile jacket with imitation leather details, a collar that can be turned up with an adjustable tab and metal buckle, a zip down the front and front pockets. Satin lining.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, roll edges and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved nursing dress in a fine knit with a wrapover bodice and seam at the waist. Double layer at the top for easier nursing access.
Wide trousers in wide wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, coin pocket at the front and fake welt back pockets. Straight-cut, ankle-length legs with creases.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Padded shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with a zipped inner compartment, flap and fastener and chunky metal chain shoulder strap. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with open lacing and pointed toes. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.
Flared skirt in several layers of glittery tulle with a wide elastic waistband. Lined.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow elasticated straps at the waist and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles, a detachable shoulder strap and one outer compartment. Unlined. Size 40x42 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with an embroidered motif at the top and long sleeves. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shorts in woven fabric with a high, pleated paper bag waist, detachable belt with a covered metal buckle and a fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners. Discreet pockets in the side seams and wide legs.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Non-wired bandeau bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless body in mesh with gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch. Jersey lining.
Top in airy viscose jersey containing glittery threads with extra-long sleeves and a slit at the cuffs.

Longer, padded jacket in cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, two-way zip at the front and an extra zip at the top for a wider neckline. Flap front pockets with concealed press-studs, zipped side pockets and a zipped chest pocket. Concealed drawstring at the waist and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Lined. Filling 70% down and 30% feathers.
Soft pile slippers with glittery embroidery and appliqués on the front. Pile linings and insoles and soles with anti-slip protectors.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Hat in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim and a high stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and wind flap with toggle fasteners. Flap front pockets with a button, handwarmer pockets with press-studs, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 40x200 cm.
Vest top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a low neckline front and back.
Long-sleeved velour body with a draped collar and deep neckline at the front ending in a wrapover knot detail. Press-studs at the crotch.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high stand-up collar with pin-tucks, a frill trim and covered buttons. Opening at the top, pin-tucks down the front and wide puff sleeves with pleats, an opening and drawstring, and cuffs with a slit. Rounded hem.
Biker jacket in soft suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Short dress in sturdy, heavyweight satin. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, seams with decorative gathers and a discreet zip in one side with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Lined.
Short, fitted off-the-shoulder dress in cotton jersey with elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Patterned tights with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Trainers with decorative elastic and appliqués at the top, a lightly padded edge and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and rubber soles.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Leggings in supersoft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and embroidered appliqués on the knees.
Short, V-neck dress in jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and hips for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Boots with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, zip at the top and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suit waistcoat in a weave containing some linen with buttons down the front, fake welt front pockets and a sewn-on, decorative tab at the back. Lined.
Gently flared blouse in airy cotton twill with a square-shaped neckline and gathers at the top. Long balloon sleeves with embroidery and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Straight-cut hem.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.

Jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Wrapover top, seam at the waist with decorative pleats at the front and a sewn-in tie belt, and long sleeves with a high slit at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, side pockets and straight, wide legs with pleats at the top. Lined at the top.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Short dress in a stretch weave with a round neck and long, cuffed sleeves. Concealed zip down the back and a gently tapered waist with a seam. Unlined.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, decorative covered buttons at the top and short sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
